snippet.title: Guild Wars 2: Path of Fire Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The launch trailer for Guild Wars 2: Path of Fire ™ is here! Prepare yourself--the battle against Balthazar begins on Friday, September 22. 

Guild Wars 2: Path of Fire is the second expansion for the award-winning game, Guild Wars 2. Visit the official expansion site at https://guildwars2.com/pathoffire for more information.
